summary: Content-focused app/site featuring lore sections; add a dedicated "Clans" section describing elemental clans and their legends.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Moon Clan sigil, monochrome emblem with lunar crescent motif (moon-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
- Sun Clan sigil, radiant emblem with sunburst and halo shapes (sun-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
- Fire Clan sigil, emblem featuring flame/volcanic shapes and sharp angular marks (fire-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
- Water Clan sigil, emblem featuring wave forms and flowing circular lines (water-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
- Lightning Clan sigil, emblem featuring lightning bolt geometry and storm-like arcs (lightning-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
- Earth Clan sigil, emblem featuring mountain/stone shapes with grounded symmetry (earth-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
- Balance Clan sigil, emblem featuring intertwined elements in symmetrical harmony (balance-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a new page section with id="clans" and a visible section header titled "Clans" that contains the provided intro paragraph and the seven clan entries (Moon, Sun, Fire, Water, Lightning, Earth, Balance) with their exact provided descriptions.
Add the new "Clans" section into the main page flow in frontend/src/App.tsx so it appears as its own standalone section (not nested inside the existing Worldbuilding section).
Update the top navigation (frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx) to include a "Clans" nav link that smooth-scrolls to the new section id="clans" on both desktop and mobile menus.
Add sigil image rendering for each clan entry in the Clans section using generated static assets stored under frontend/public/assets/generated, with appropriate alt text (e.g., "Moon Clan sigil").

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a "Clans" section and populate it with the provided clan descriptions (Moon, Sun, Fire, Water, Lightning, Earth, Balance) and associated sigil placeholders.

projectName: Add dedicated Clans section with clan lore and sigil images
